titleStmt.title: A proposal to ease the subject, and to restore the credit of the nation so that within six months, bank-bills and tallies will be as current as ever they were, and the want of money supplied. / Humbly offered to the consideration of the Honourable House of Commons, by W.V.
titleStmt.author: Van Laitz, W.

notesStmt.note: Docket title: A proposal to restore the credit of the nation, and make bank bills and tallies, &c. current.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
